verses.name: Psalms 38:1
verses.text: O Lord, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

verses.name: Psalms 38:2
verses.text: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.

verses.name: Psalms 38:3
verses.text: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.

verses.name: Psalms 38:4
verses.text: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.

verses.name: Psalms 38:5
verses.text: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.

verses.name: Psalms 38:6
verses.text: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.
